metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3948 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Squid 3.x before 3.5.16 and 4.x before 4.0.8 improperly perform bounds checking, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted HTTP response, related to Vary headers.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> needs substantial backporting There are no current plans to fix this CVE in Ubuntu 12.04 LTS and Ubuntu 14.04 LTS.

criterions.comment: squid3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
